ComicInfo.Title: The Two-Headed Thing!!; I Spent a Night in a Haunted House!; Where?; Do Not Panic!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-03-24 19:35:44. [CVDB177447] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 14:47:45. [Issue ID 96180]
ComicInfo.Penciller: Jack Kirby,Don Heck,Joe Maneely,Steve Ditko,Jack Kirby,Don Heck,Joe Maneely,Steve Ditko
ComicInfo.Inker: Dick Ayers,Don Heck,Joe Maneely,Steve Ditko,Dick Ayers,Don Heck,Joe Maneely,Steve Ditko
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Two-Headed Thing!!: In a storm, a convict escapes through a hole smashed in the wall. When they find him, he tells a tale of a shape-shifting monster. When the guards scoff, the escapee reveals that HE is the monster, and they are only saved by a lightning strike.
I Spent a Night in a Haunted House!: A young boy who has just moved to town is convinced to spend the night in a haunted house. He doesn't find any ghosts but the next day is realizes the house itself was the ghost.
Where?: A story of an amnesic old vampire that feeds only once a year at midnight.
Do Not Panic!: An alien craft arrives over a city and descends. The pilot wears a frightening spacesuit, but since the military do not panic, they do not attack, and when the human pilot removes his helmet he is warmly greeted by the people of Mars.
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
